Run Bayesian GAM Model for a Single Gene

Source: R/run_model.R
run_trajectory_model.Rd

This function runs a Bayesian GAM model for a single gene across a trajectory.

Usage

run_trajectory_model(
  data_array,
  gene_index,
  n_knots = 5,
  n_samples = 2000,
  backend = "rstan"
)

Arguments

data_array

A 3D array of expression values [batch, time, gene]

gene_index

Index of the gene to model in the 3D array

n_knots

Number of knots for the cubic regression spline (default: 5)

n_samples

Number of MCMC samples (default: 2000)

backend

Backend to use for Stan models ("rstan" or "cmdstanr", defaults to "rstan")

Value

A fitted model object from bayesian_gam_regression_nb_shape
